attributes.action: Change the licensing of the BBC to allow UK TV License holders outside the UK to view BBC programmes via the Internet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would allow those that have paid for their TV license to actually get the benefit of it because by law they must have one if they have a TV in their property even if they are not resident in the UK for long peiods due to work commitments etc. The secondary reason would be to allow more revenue to the UK by allowing viewing from outside the UK by non UK residents.
